thread.title: K. Lauer
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by K. Lauer

author: K. Lauer
title: K. Lauer
text: We ordered two glass lamp shades for our vintage lamps on a Sunday evening, hoping they would arrive in time for a gathering on Saturday, but pretty sure they wouldn't. The package arrived Wednesday (hooray!), the shades were perfect, and the price was unbeatable.
